DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate the analgesic safety and efficacy of study drug (AP0302) applied topically every 6 hours as compared to a vehicle, in subjects experiencing delayed onset muscle soreness.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study of AP0302 5% Versus a Vehicle Comparator
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of S-Ibuprofen Topical Gel 5% in reducing pain/soreness associated with delayed onset muscle soreness (DOMS).
DOC.criteria: no clinically significant medical conditions BMI between 1830 negative drug, alcohol, pregnancy screens other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply no upper extremity workout in last 6 months no job requiring heavy lifting history of muscle disorders allergy or intolerance to study drug history of recent pain medication use other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
